document.full_text: the date for nfl owners to argue for a dismissal of the antitrust lawsuit filed by a group of locked-out players has been moved up by two weeks to aug. 29.
document.title: judge moves n.f.l. lawsuit hearing up by two weeks
lines_and_colors: the date for nfl owners to argue for a dismissal of the antitrust lawsuit filed by a group of locked-out players has been moved up by two weeks to aug. 29.
